ValidationRule.description: If Data Change is set to "Yes" you must choose a value in the Custom Script field Updated 11/5/2019 per NICC-038406
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(OR(RecordType.Name = 'Hosted RFC',RecordType.Name = 'HRM RFC',RecordType.Name = 'PMS RFC'),ISPICKVAL( Data_Change__c ,"Yes"),ISBLANK(TEXT( Custom_Script__c )))
/* RecordTypeId = "0126000000016TJ" && ISPICKVAL( Data_Change__c ,"Yes") && ISBLANK(TEXT( Custom_Script__c )) */
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must select a value for the Custom Script field
